kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de
bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las

gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /don

dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid
kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas
stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thog ma dang
tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thog ma

dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong

pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid

las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos
nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las
gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las
gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las
gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ma yin| dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams
las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa med do/ /stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
do/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /stobs
rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid las gud
na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan
rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi
chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshad med
pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ rnam par thar pa rnams

kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / /mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mngon par
shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa
rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ting

nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs

kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid
las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos
nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /so so yang dag
par rig pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de
bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byams pa chen po'ang shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byams pa chen

po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying
rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las
gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// //shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya bco lnga pa/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ che ba ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshad
ma med pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshad med pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la
bslab cing rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob
bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rang byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par sangs rgyas
par 'gyur ro/ /de la bslab cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems can yongs su smin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
smras pa/ kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ che ba ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshad ma med pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshad med pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la bslab cing rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ rang byang chub tu mngon
par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de la bslab cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems can yongs su smin
par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi
dmigs so// kau shi ka /'du shes rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar 'du shes kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /'du byed rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus
mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/
'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /mig rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' med dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /

kau shi ka /rna ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i sngon gyi mtha'
mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /sna rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sna'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /lce rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lce'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/

lus rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /yid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs

so/ /kau shi ka /sgra rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sgra'i sngon gyi
mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /dri rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar dri'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /ro rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar ro'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /

kau shi ka /reg rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar reg gi sngon gyi mtha' mi
dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /chos rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar chos rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /mig gi rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'

mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /sna'i rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi
ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /lce'i rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /lus kyi rnam par shes pa rgya

che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha'
mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /mig gi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /rna ba'i 'dus
te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te
reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /sna'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /lce'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya
che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon
gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus
mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /
rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus ma dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /sna'i
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar
sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi
ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /sa'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /chu'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar chu'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /me'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba
yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar mi'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /rlung gi khams rgya che
ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar rlung gi
khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /nam mkha'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin
te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ ma
rig pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i sngon
gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /'du byed rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang

mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di ni/ rgya che ba yin te/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar/ gzugs kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med
do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du gzugs kyi chad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs tshad med do/ /gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
de ni/ 'di ltar tshor ba'i tshad ma ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ma ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i tshad ma yang
dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir tshor ba tshad med do/ /tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'du shes tshad med pa'i

do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ma ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du 'du shes kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam
mkha' tshad ma med pa'i phyir 'du shes tshad med do/ /'du shes tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'du byed tshad med pa'i phyir

do/ /kau shi ka /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ma ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad ma yang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad

med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad ma med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad

ma med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad ma ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ma ni/ dmigs

pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du mig gi

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/
'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /
kau shi ka /de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med
do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i
phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ nang stong pa nyid tshad
med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid
kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang
dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /nang stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ phyi stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs
su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid tshad
med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir phyi nang
stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs
su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/
nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ chen
po stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar
chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du chen po stong pa
nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ don nam pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam
mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir don dam pa stong
pa nyid tshad med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/
dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs
su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//
kau shi ka/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
de ni/ 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/
de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad
med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar thog ma
dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa

stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/

de bzhin du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du chos thams
cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin
du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong
pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i
tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i
tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /dngos po

med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad

med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de

bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad

med do/ /kau shi ka/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de
ni/ 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ /dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste / dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do//

kau shi ka/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tshad med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tshad med pa'i phyir

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ yang dag par dpong ba tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de
bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba tshad med do/ /yang dag par spong ba tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du rdzu

'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad
med do/ /kau shi ka/ dbang po tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar
dbang po rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du dbang po rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs
su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dbang po tshad med do/ /dbang po tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ stobs tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du stobs rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir stobs tshad med do/ /stobs tshad med

pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ byang chub kyi yan lag tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa
ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/
dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag tshad med do/ /byang chub kyi
yan lag tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'phags pa'i lan yan lag brgyad pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka /
'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med
pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad kyang
dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa tshad med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ bsam

gtan tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su
med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir bsam

gtan tshad med do/ /bsam gtan tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ byams pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar byams pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi

ka/ de bzhin du byams pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir byams pa tshad med do/ /byams pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/
snying rje tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar snying rje'i
tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du snying rje'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir

snying rje tshad med do/ /snying rje tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ kau shi ka/ dga' ba tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dga' ba'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do//

kau shi ka/ de bzhin du dga' ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir dga' ba tshad med do/ /dga' ba tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi
ka/ btang snyoms tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar btang snyoms kyi
tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du btang snyoms kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad

med pa'i phyir btang snyoms tshad med do/ btang snyoms tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su
med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha'
tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ rnam par

thar pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi tshad ni/
dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha'

tshad med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa tshad med do/ /rnam par thar pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med
pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshad
ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
med pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa tshad med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ mngon par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na/ nam mkha' tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa tshad med do/ /

mngon par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau

shi ka/ de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin tshad med do/ /ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med

do/ /kau shi ka/ gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzungs
kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams
kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo tshad med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du mi 'jigs

pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa tshad med do/ /mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ so so yang

dag par rig pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam

mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ snying rje chen po tshad med pa'i phyir byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/

dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du snying rje chen po'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir snying rje chen po tshad med do/ /snying rje chen po

tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i
tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad
med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ thams cad shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir thams cad shes pa nyid tshad
med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med
do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad

med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa de ni/ tshad med pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya bco brgyad pa/ /kau shi ka/ gzugs
mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi
dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ 'du shes mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du shes kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam par shes pa
mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha'
dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mig mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rna ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sna mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sna'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lce mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lce'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lus mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lus kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ yid mtha' yas pa'i
phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar yid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau
shi ka/ gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs
kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sgra mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sgra'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ dri mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dri'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ ro mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar ro'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ reg mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar reg gi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/
chos mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi mtha' dang
dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sna'i rnam par
shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sna'i rnam par
shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau
shi ka/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di
ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rna ba'i 'dus te
reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te
reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa
ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas
pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis

yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka/ byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /
kau shi ka/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
de ni/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ thams cad shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lam gyi rnam
pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lam gyi
rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'du shes mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes
pa mtha' yas pa dang / mig mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna mtha' yas pa dang / lce mtha' yas pa dang / lus mtha' yas pa dang / yid mtha' yas
pa dang / gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / sgra mtha' yas pa dang / dri mtha' yas pa dang / ro mtha' yas pa dang / reg mtha' yas pa dang / chos mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes
pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes
pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas ba dang / sa'i khams mtha' yas pa
dang / chu'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / me'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas
pa dang / ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / ming dang gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / skye mched drug mtha' yas pa dang / reg
pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sred pa mtha' yas pa dang / len pa mtha' yas pa dang / srid pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba mtha' yas pa dang / rga shi mtha' yas pa
