dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid

mtha' yas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus

byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dor
ba med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha'
yas pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / dbang po
rnams mtha' yas pa dang / stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mtha' yas pa dang / tshad med pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtha' yas
pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
smon pa med pa mtha' yas pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa dang / snying rje chen po mtha'
yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / phyir mi
'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang byang chub mtha' yas pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de rnam pa gang gis na
dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe bya/
rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang chos dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de rnam pa gang gis na chos dmigs
pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor
gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa/ rab 'byor/ de rnam pa gang gis na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de ni/
'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir dmigs pa mtha' yas so/ /dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so/ /ko shi ka/ de bzhin nyid dang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i
phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos
gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te/ 'di ltar sems can
sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa/ dngos po med par ming du btags pa/ dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam
du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi
ka/ gang la sems can du bshad pa gang yang med pa de la/ sems can mtha' yas pa ci zhig yod de/ kau shi ka/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/ sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ de la sems can gang
yang skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras
pa/ kau shi ka/ de ltar rnam grangs des na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye rgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skyes pa dang bud med du bcas pa dag gis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de gang gnas
brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bshad cing brjod de bstan pa'i chos 'di
ni/ kye ma legs par bshad do/ /kye ma chos 'di legs par bshad do/ /kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni/ legs par bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/ gzugs sam/ tshor
ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/
chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ yid kyi rnam par
shes pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/
mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam
mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa'am/ tshor ba'am/
sred pa'am/ len pa'am/ srid pa'am/ skye ba'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa
nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi
dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong
ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge
'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen
po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra
bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyis
kyang theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa mchis te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg
pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ de ltar chos gang yang dmigs
su med de/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/
sgra'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lce'i rnam par shes
pa'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa
'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/
ma rig pa'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa'am/ tshor ba'am/ sred pa'am/ len pa'am/ srid pa'am/ skye ba'am/
rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa
stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams
sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa
rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi/ theg pa gsum rnam par dgong pa'ang yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ /lha'i bu dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te
gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan
du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang
de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin
gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//
phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang
de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi
dmigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dor ba med
pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid las
gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin
gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin
gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs
pa mi dmigs so/ /dbang po rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan
lag rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa rnams las
gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhan du'ang
de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /ting nge
'dzin rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du'ang
de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /byams pa chen po las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi
rnam pa shas pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs
so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ / bam po brgya bcu dgu pa/ /lha'i bu dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos 'di dag thams

cad la slob ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /nang stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /phyi stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /stong pa nyid stong
pa nyid la slob bo/ /chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /mtha' las 'das pa

stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob bo//

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid la slob bo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob bo/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob bo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob bo/ /dbang po rnams la slob bo/ /stobs rnams la slob bo/ /byang
chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob bo/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob bo/ /bsam gtan rnams la slob bo/ /tshad med pa rnams la
slob bo/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la slob bo/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo/ /rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob bo/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la slob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob bo/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob bo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob bo/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams la slob bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob bo/ /byams pa chen po la slob bo/ /snying rje chen po la slob bo/ /sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob bo/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo/ /dgra bcom pa
nyid la slob bo/ /rang byang chub la slob bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo/ /lha'i bu dag/ de bas na/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar spyod pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/ lha'i bu dag/ gang gi tshe de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zham ring byed cing rgyal po'i khab pad+mo yod pa'i nang gi tshong 'dus kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i tshe sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin ba dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma

gyur to/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /chen po stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//
don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//

chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang

bral bar ma gyur to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//
yang dag par spong ba rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /dbang po rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /byang
chub kyi yan lag rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /bsam gtan
rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /tshad med pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /rnam par thar pa rnams dang bral
bar ma gyur to/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang bral
bar ma gyur to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /byams
pa chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /snying rje chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas
kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur to/ /lha'i bu dag/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis nga la
bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa na bskal pa bzang po'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro/ /zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor
ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig mi len mi 'dor
ba'i tshul dang / rna ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid mi len mi 'dor ba'i
tshul dang / gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sgra mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dri mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ro mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg mi len mi 'dor ba'i
tshul dang / chos mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi
len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i
tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te
reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi
'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi len mi 'dor
ba'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ma rig pa
mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye mched
drug mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sred pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / len pa mi len mi 'dor
ba'i tshul dang / srid pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rga shi mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i

tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi

stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor
ba'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs

pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stobs rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan
rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshad med pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam
par thar pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzungs
kyi sgo rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / so so
yang dag par rig pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thams cad shes pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris

kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu

dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang / snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung snang gi lha'i bu dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / kun

snang dang ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshad med che
ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang / mi che ba'i lha'i bu dang / mi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /
'og min gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par mkhyen nas de dag thams cad dbang du btsugs te lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral ba de dag ni/ bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du shes stong
pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /
de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna stong pa nyid
shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa
med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sgra stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
brlabs par 'gyur/ dri stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ro stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
chos stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags
mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin
tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i
rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa
med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna
ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu
byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do//
de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa
la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
'gyur/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ me'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
brlabs par 'gyur/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la
glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ma rig pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid
shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sred pa stong pa nyid shin
tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ len pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ srid pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye ba stong pa nyid shin tu
byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rga shi stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan
ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu
byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
par 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan
ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stong pa nyid
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
'gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dor
ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa
nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po
med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas
mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin
gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dbang po rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa
nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /
rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshad
med pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par thar
pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin
gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags
mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mi 'jigs
pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byams pa chen po stong pa nyid shin
tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon
pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di
ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur pa dang / gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur pa de dag gi ngo bo nyid med do/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo de dag la ni/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa glags lta zhing glags 'tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
de dag gis de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo de dag ni/ nyam nga ba mi spong pas dus byed par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de
dag gis sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i rim gros bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /
kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha'i bu
gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos pa dang / ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
mnyan par bya'o/ /gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma
bral bar bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing / 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul
bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung / bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung / lam gol
ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs pa'am dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu
bsgoms so/ /phyi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /chen po stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /
'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
shin tu bsgoms so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang pa'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha
dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
cag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul
bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yid la bgyi ba dang mi 'bral ba de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi tshad par bsrung ba dang / bskyang
ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ sems can dmyal ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur
byol song gi skye gnas rnams kyang rgyun tshad par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyang rgyun tshad par 'gyur/ lha las phongs pa rnams kyang rgyun tshad par 'gyur/ mi las dbul ba rnams
kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rgyun tshad cing 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ mu ge'i zhugs ngam thams cad kyang rgyun chad par
'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung
bar 'gyur/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du
'byung bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du
'byung bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stong pa
nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus
byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ thog
ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbang
po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzungs
kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ bram ze'i
rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams mchis par 'gyur/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams mchis
par 'gyur/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs lha nye phan
gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung
snang gi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/
chung dge'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/
chung che'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ mi che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/
mi gdung ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'og min gyi lha rnams mchis
par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ rgyun du zhugs pa mchis par 'gyur/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ phyir mi 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa nyid mchis
par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa mchis par 'gyur/ rang byang chub mchis par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ sems
can yongs su smin pa mchis par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mchis par 'gyur/ 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mchis par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun
dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ de de bzhin
no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas
thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /lha las phongs pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /mi las dbul ba thams cad rgyun
chad par 'gyur ro/ /nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /mu ge'i mya ngan thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
ro/ /tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du
'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa
stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig
rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par
thar pa'i sgo gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten
du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /bram za'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag
gi rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang
byed kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur
ro/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur
ro/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur
ro/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /'bras
bu che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur
ro/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par
'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa yod par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par
'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa yod par 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub yod par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas yod par 'gyur
ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ sems can yongs su smin pa yod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
chos dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems pa de ni/ nga la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud
du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems so/ /de bas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu
dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta ste/ dper
na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ rtsi skyang gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas kyis gang bar gyur la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis nam 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang /
phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma bral ba zhig la rim gror byas/ bkur
stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de ni/ de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de
dag yod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten
du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig rten du yod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ de bas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang /
bskyab par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu drug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya nyi shu
pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gis tshe 'di la 'thob pa'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur
zhing sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas
kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / phu dud du bgyi ba dang / mchod
par bgyi bar 'tshal ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du dran pa mi nyams pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa
yongs su 'dzin pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'od
phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mig phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa
yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sgrub cing / 'jig
rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su mchi ba dang / gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams skye zhing 'byung bar ma gyur pa de dang de dag tu mchis shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod

pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod
pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / mtha' las 'das
pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang /

dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i
yon tan brjod pa dang / yang dag par spong pa bzhi'i yon tan brjod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan brjod pa dang / dbang po lnga'i yon tan brjod pa dang / stobs lnga'i yon tan brjod
pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan brjod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i yon tan brjod pa dang / bsam
gtan bzhi'i yon tan brjod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i yon tan brjod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan brjod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon
tan brjod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan brjod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i yon
tan brjod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan brjod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan brjod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan brjod pa dang / byams pa chen po'i
yon tan brjod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i yon tan brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yon tan brjod pa dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos
ston pa dang / sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang theg pa gsum la 'dul ba ni/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas lha'i
dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
po thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su
bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung
bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs

su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su
bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs
su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su
bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / /bsam gtan
rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / tshad med pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang /
rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i
sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs
su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa
rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po
yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur
ba dang / rang byang chub yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur
ba'ang ngo mtshar che'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /

phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung
bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /
thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams
cad stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa
nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams
yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs
su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams yongs su bzung bar
'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par
shes pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa
chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yongs
su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung bar
'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin
du yid la byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gang dang gang yongs su zin par 'gyur ba de dang de dag bstan gyi/ shin tu legs par nyon la
yid la gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bgyi'o/ zhes nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi
ka/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / mu stegs spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang / bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'am/ gang zag nga rgyal can gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di la brgal bar 'dod pa dang / 'di dang dbral bar 'dod pa dang / 'di la brtsad par 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar 'dod pa zhig byung na/ 'gal bar
'dod pa dang / dbral bar 'dod pa dang / brtsad par 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar 'dod pa de dag gi rgol ba dang / dbral bar bya ba dang / brtsad pa dang / 'gal bar byed pa gang dang gang byung
ba kun kyang myur du nub cing med par 'gyur te/ 'gal bar dga' ba dang / dbral bar dga' ba dang / brtsad par dga' ba dang / 'gal bar dga' ba de dag gi bsam pa'ang yongs
su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gang gi don du sems can rnams yun ring por 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / shags su gyur pa'i
phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi don du
sems can de dag yun ring por tshul khrims ngan par gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste sems can de dag tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi don du sems can de dag yun ring por khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 'tshe bar gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste sems can de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi don du sems can de dag yun ring por le lo byed par gyur
pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste sems can de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi
don du sems can de dag yun ring por sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste sems can de dag bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi don du sems can de dag yun ring por shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa dang / yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gang gi don du sems can de dag 'di
lta ste/ bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang bas 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur pa'i bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos rnam par brtsal te sems can de dag bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /tshad med pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul
ba'i phyir ro/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /dbang po lnga la yang dag par bskul ba'i
phyir ro// stobs lnga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag
par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la yang dag par bskul
ba'i phyir ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par
bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /byams pa chen po la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /snying rje chen po la yang dag par bskul
ba'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /lan gcig phyir
'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /
rang byang chub la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ tshe 'di la yon tan de dag 'byung ste/ tshe rabs gzhan la'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can rnams smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du rab tu bkod nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las
'da' bar 'gyur te/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshe rabs gzhan la 'byung ba'i yon tan dang legs pa dag go /kau
shi ka/ gzhan yang sa'i phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin
du yid la byed pa yod pa'i sa'i phyogs der bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'am/ mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu ba'am/ gang zag pa rgyal can rnams kyis shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brgal ba'am/ brtsad pa'am/ 'gal ba'am/ med par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar mi nus te/ de'i gong du de dag la yon tan dang legs par gyur pa ni/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa dang / bzung ba dang / bsgoms pas/ theg pa gsum gyis byung nas sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
