nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa
nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub
pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang
po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams nye
bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms bar 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par
shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa
ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no/ /zhes bya bar shes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa sgom pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes
par bya ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so/ /zhes bya ba gnang ste/ kau shi ka /legs
so/ legs so/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi gnyis pa'o/ /kau shi ka /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad
do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang bsam gtan
gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis
su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa
de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su
byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la
gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / /de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang bzod pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid
de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis
su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// kau shi ka /gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i
mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad
do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di
ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa
de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la
gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis
mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med
de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
ka /de ni/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis
su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa la gnyis su 'dod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya nyer bdun pa/
de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ de la bslab pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du
bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ der lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig bdag gi rim grol mchis pa de dag kun klung bdag la mchod par bgyid de/ nam
bdag der ma mchis shing stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe'ang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams
la chos ston to/ /zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing / phyag btsal te slar mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha ton du bgyid cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa der phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ 'di las byung

ngo / /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
bgyi zhing 'dud pa bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to/ /rgyur gyur to/ /rkyen du gyur to/ /yongs su bsgrub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na/ cha de gnyis las
bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis
kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe
na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis
pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
'das/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa
ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mtshan ma ma
mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nang stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma
ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ nang stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyi stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/
rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyi stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chen po stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ chen po stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong
pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ smos su
ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ thog ma dang tha
ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
'das/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
bcom ldan 'das/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du
ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma
mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma
mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/
mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/
mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan
'das/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis
pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang
dag par spong ba rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dbang po rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis
pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ dbang po rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stobs rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
bcom ldan 'das/ stobs rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ mtshan
ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan rnams
ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshad med pa
rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshad med pa rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par thar
pa rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa
ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod
du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/
rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ so so yang
dag par rig pa rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ snying rje chen po ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ snying rje chen po ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
rnams ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thams cad shes pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
thams cad shes pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
ldan 'das/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod
du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma
mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams
cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi ston te/ bcom
ldan 'das/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs
pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis
pa'i chos ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang / phreng ba dang /
spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyi

bar 'os pa'o/ /bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /
bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyi par 'os pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub pa dang /
tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ de ni/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma
mchis par bgyi'o/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can
yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog
dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti
dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang bris te stsal na/ bcom
ldan 'das/ dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang /
phu dud du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de dag la rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod
par bgyis na log par ltung ba dang / ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas/ smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
theg pa'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni/ mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das
pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad
du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni/ cho 'phrul rnam
pa gsum mo/ /'di las byung ba ni/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar
'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan
yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / shar lho'i phyogs
mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang
pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di
ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang /
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du
zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni/ cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo/ /
'di las byung ba ni/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang /
skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang
phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / phreng
ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang /
mchod pa bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa'ang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las
byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi/
pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa des ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i
rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa
ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to/ /'chang ngo / /klog go /kun chub par bgyid do/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do/ /bris pa de la'ang me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang /
phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid de/ bcom
ldan 'das/ de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o/ /nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang rigs kyi

bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyid pa des
ni/ gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig
'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la brten na/ de rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la brten pas/ sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la brten pas/ de dag gis
'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ de ltar gnas te/ gang rgyal po la brten pa ni/ mthu dang ldan pa la brten pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de
bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na/ mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
shes gang lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bas na/ bdag gis cha de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu
rtsa gnyis so/ /'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/ /'di las byung ba ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o/ /'di las byung ba ni/ so so yang
dag par rig pa bzhi'o/ /'di las byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do/ /'di las byung ba ni/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di las byung ba ni
pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ /'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ grong ngam/ grong
rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog
cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bris shing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa de dag tu mi 'am mi ma lags pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags
rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las/ theg pa gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
'das/ de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ don chen po dang ldan pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
don du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni/ sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po mi dpogs rin chen zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni/ nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan gyi
rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der mi ma lags pa rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/ mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa'am bud
med kyang nor bu rin po che de bstan na/ mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod de myur du 'pho zhing mi gnas so/ /mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che
chen po de btags na/ mkhris pa de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung gis mnar ba'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ rlung de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan gyis non pa'i
lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ bad kan de'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ 'dus pa'i bro de'ang zhi bar
'gyur zhing rnam par mi 'phel lo/ /nub mo ni/ snang bar bgyid do/ /tsha ba'i dus na ni/ nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do/ /grang ba'i dus
na nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de dro bar bgyid do/ /nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de'ang ha cang yang mi dro/ /
ha cang yang mi grang zhing ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ /nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i sa'i phyogs der sbrul lam/ de ma lags pa sdig pa la sogs pa
gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skyes pa'am/ bud med la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/ des de mthong ma thag tu
dug de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nor bu rin po che chen po de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa'am/ bud med la la zhig 'brum bus btab bam/
mig rab rib can du gyur te/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad cig byung ba las de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po
btags na/ de dag gi 'brum bu'am/ rab rib bam/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ nor bu rin po che chen po de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de chab rnyog pa can gyi nang du stsal na/ de'i mod la chab de thams
cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos sngon pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur
ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen
po de gos dmar pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dkar pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/
chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos le brgan gyis dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu
rin po che chen po de shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyis dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de dag dang / gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po
che chen po de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /chab de la rnyog pa mchis pa'ang nor bu rin po che chen po des dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ nor bu
rin po che chen po de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang lha rdzas kyi nor bu
rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/ 'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la'ang yod/ brgya byin gyis
smras pa/ btsun pa dga' bo/ nor bu rin po che chen po de ni/ lha rdzas te/ btsun pa dga' bo/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che gang yod pa de dag ni/ chung zhing lci/ lha rdzas kyi nor
bu rin po che chen po de ni/ che zhing yang ste/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni/ lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ dzam+bu'i gling gi nor bu
rin po che de dag gis ni/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i grangs sam/ cha'am/ bgrang ba'am/ dpe'am/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du stsal stsal ba las snod de nas phyung yang snod de ni/ nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan
gyis yid du mchi bar 'gyur te/ gzhan yang snod de la mos pa bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo de dag gi lus sam/ sems kyis sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa mi las gyur pa'am/ mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/
nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan gyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ brtson 'grus kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni/ tshad
ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig
brjod par bgyi ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan
'das/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan
ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan
lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chen pa stong pa nyid kyi snod
do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gdung de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma
mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan

ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par

bgyi ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon

tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos

thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos thams cad stong

pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon
tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom

ldan 'das/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma
mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
par bgyi ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/
yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag
par spong ba rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dbang po lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod bar bgyi ste/ dbang po rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma
ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stobs lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni/
tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stobs rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byang
chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan lte ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi snod do/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi
yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshad med pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji
snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshad med pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshad med pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku gdung de dag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar
pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa dgu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i yon tan lta ji
snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/

mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi

snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge
'dzin rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni/
tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi
ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i
yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang so so
yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang snying rje chen po'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa rnams kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thams cad shes pa
nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod
do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig
brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan

lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan
ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzhan ma yin
pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
chos nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos mi 'gyur ba
nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
par bgyi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i
nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan ni/ /tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i
snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi nyams pa'i
chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi snod de/ /de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ mchod pa
mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod de/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku gdung de dag na mchod pa mnga'o/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye ba mi 'gag pa'i snod de/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gdung de dag ni/ mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa dbri ba dang / bsnan pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba
dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'o/ /de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa mya ngan las 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ mchod pa mnga'o/ /gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong tshan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
gis byur bur yongs su gtams pa lta zhig gi /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis
byur bur gtams pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di nyid len to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te/
mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi
bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur ster bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha'
mi dmigs shing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'am/ mtshe

ma'i lha'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal mthar

'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni/ de tsam du bas kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / bklags shing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul

bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs

par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs
su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa
bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su
rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par
bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes bu'i lus sam/
brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur
ro/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas byang chub
sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ de bas na/ bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ glo ba ma ches pa'ang ma mchis/ mchod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma
lags/ gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur
sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag
kyang chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag
par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni/ phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun
chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis po 'di dag ni/ chos nyid de/
gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la 'dus byas chos rnams kyi

chos nyid gang lags she na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa
nyid kyi ye shes dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi
ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye
shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang /
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar
pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngon
par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i

ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /
mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ de ni
gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /
rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib ba ma mchis pa ste/ de ni/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
gang lags she na/ chos thams cad ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ de ni/ 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka
de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /'das
pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyad cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang
ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob po/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs

rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gang

ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rang byang chub thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa
med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / len pa med
pa'i tshul dang / 'dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang / blang ba med pa'i tshul dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de'ang
'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshu rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma
yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin// 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/
'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi ka/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/

kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ kau
shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya nyer brgyad pa/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'ang 'tshal te/ sems can du dmigs pa
ma mchis so/ /sems can du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /srog tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'gro bar
dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gang zag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /shed can du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /shed bdag
tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /byed pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /shes pa bor dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /
gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'du shes su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis
so/ /rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /snar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lcer dmigs pa ma mchis
so/ /lus su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sgrar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /drir dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /
ror dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /reg tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes par
dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis
yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te
reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma
mchis so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa
las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma
mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /me'i khams
su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /
ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /ming dang gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /skye
mched drug tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sred par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /len par dmigs pa ma mchis
so/ /srid par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin bar dmigs pa ma mchis
so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyi stong pa nyid du
dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /don dam pa
stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du
dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs pa
ma mchis so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma
mchis so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis
so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /dbang po
rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs
pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshad med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis
so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs
pa ma mchis so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /
so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis
so| |dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /byang chub tu dmigs pa ma
mchis so/ /sangs rgyas su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dmigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma
lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de
la ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi dmigs pa'i tshul du
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyod pas/ des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lta'ang ci smos/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi/ de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs
gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'ang mi
dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyang ma dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ le lo'ang mi dmigs
so/ /bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ shes rab
'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs
pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs
pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par
shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i
tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna
ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi
dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul
dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs
