pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul
dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming
dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul
dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs
pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i
tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa
nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don
dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin
stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi
dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i
tshul dang / dbang po lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul
dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi

dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul
dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs
pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro
ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /
kau shi ka /'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du
'khod kyang de dag gi gri ba ma la khyad par ram/ bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram/ bye brag mi dmigs so/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du
yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs
ba dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur
stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te gzhan la stsal na/ de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas na/ khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig /kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po
de blangs te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror
byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos
dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par
bgyis pa bas/ gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na/ 'di ni/ de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/ sems can gyi ris na de bzhin
gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la
las chung du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug
bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te chos kyi dga' bas
gzhan la byin na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi ba'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ste bshad cing bstan pa dang / brjod cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni/ ston pa yin par bsam mo/ /bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la
la zhig yin par bsam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni/ gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzhan zhes
bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab
pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs

rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab cing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab cing rang byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab cing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ko shi ka /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod
par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/ gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te brten cing rnam
par spyad par bya snyam na/ kau shi ka /de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu dang / mi dang / lha
dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na de dang 'dra ba'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de lta yin na/ bdag gis chos zhi ba/ bzang po gang
bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o/ snyam du bsams so/ /kau shi ka /chos de'ang
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ kau shi ka /de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du
byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lha ci smos/ nyan
thos kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng
ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba
dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams so/ /byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ /kau shi ka /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
dang rigs kyi bu mo'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba
dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu dud du
bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas

kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /
bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa'am/ bri ba'am/ /
kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par
'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang /
thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur ba dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang
chub thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang
zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po
stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa

nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po
dang / btang snyoms chen po dang 'di dag ni/ zag pa med pa'i chos te/ de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan to/ /de dag la bslab
cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du
'phel gyi/ dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i
sems can rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
bkod pa'i sems can ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/ kau shi ka /gang la las dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang
chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/ rigs
kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

sems can gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /byang chub
sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa'
las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang
mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang / phreng ba dang /
spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang /
bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ kau shi ka /de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom
ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bri ba'am/ bklag pa'am/ /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /
'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob po/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams
kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug
par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/ /mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur

ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog
ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin
thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan
to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i
phyir gzhan la byin na/ de ni/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/
de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
yod do/ /tshangs ris kye lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha
rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha
rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med
min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid
stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid
stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa
nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi
'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong pa rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka /dzam+bu'i gling gi sems
can rnams lta zhog gi /kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo //
bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs
bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /
'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur
ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams
kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug
go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar

'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong

pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa

stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po

med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam
gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs
kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du
'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau sha ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing
mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod

do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med
snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye
mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa
stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med
pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa
stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden
pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod
do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po rnams yod
do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa
nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /
phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka /gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi /kau shi ka /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur
bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir
gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher
bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob
bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med

pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong

pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med

pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rigs bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang
snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches med du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing ma thob rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs
che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i
lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha
rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod
do| |kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams
yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong
ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang
stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod
do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam
gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra
bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnams yod do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya nyer dgu pa/ /kau shi ka /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi /kau shi ka /
stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam
du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba dang / bklag pa dang /
kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams
rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /
thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos

de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa

stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo

bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /
kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
la byin na/ de bas de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya
cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs tshe zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal
chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan
'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod
do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams
yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha
rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes

med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa
nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan
lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod
do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yod do/ /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang
sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi
ka /stong gnyis pa'i 'jigs rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhig gi /kau shi ka /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsal pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang
byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos

thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa
brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting
nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med
pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba
dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba
rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha
rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha
rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che
ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha
rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang

stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo
bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod
do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams
yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod
do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod
do/ /kau shi ka /phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba
bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/
mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i
glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /
'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur
ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob po/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems
dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa
nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /

chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / snon pa med pa
dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho
ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /
dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod
do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang pa'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dag ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha
rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin
tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye
mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus
byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang
bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge
'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs ba rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /
snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du
sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin
na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la
bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob
bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob
bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob po/ /'thob par
'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag
kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong
pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa

nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med

pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang
rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha
ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs
che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i

lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi

lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha

rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i
lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam
mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched

kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha

rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod
do/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med

pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /
bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs bed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin
rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod
do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid
yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /
phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi /kau shi ka /gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde
bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri
ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i
chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob
bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur
ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi
ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang
snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram
ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /

tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i
lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i
