lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu
mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi
lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang

stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos

thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes
pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod
do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod
do/ /kau shi ka /gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi /kau shi ka /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs
kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam
du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/
bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing
rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur
ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par
gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas

stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po

med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po

dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan te/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram
ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe
ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga' lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye
phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /
tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ dge rgyas kyi lha
rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha
rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes
mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod
do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /

'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa

nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams
yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs
pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /len gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams
yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// /shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya sum cu pa/ /kau shi ka /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi /kau shi ka /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs

bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par

gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /thob par
'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/

'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /

dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa

nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco

brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam
grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i
bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to/ /de dag yod pas
rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu
rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha

rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//
tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams
yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod
do/ /mi gdung pa'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod

do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam
pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa
stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong

pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /
bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi
rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa
rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams lta zhog gi /kau shi ka /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/
'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par
zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /
thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi
theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs
par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen
po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya char bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des
kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod
nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs
che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum
gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod

do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang

ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che pa'i

lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / shin tu mthong
ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha'
yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo
bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam
gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod
do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes
pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod
do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /
kau shi ka /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan
bzhi la bkod de tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi
bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod
nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya tshar bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing
rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra
bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang /
ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa
gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang /
bri ba dang / /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs
che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i
lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs

chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung
dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras
bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung pa'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams
yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes
med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong
pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /
rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan
lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams
yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun
du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di
ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par
zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /
thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs
rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /

mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa

dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba
chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i
rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha
rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams
yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun

snang dang pa'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i
lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad
med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong
pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong
pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang
bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod
do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam
gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo
rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom
pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
yod do/ /kau shi ka /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad
med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am
rigs kyi bu mo gang gas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams
ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi
bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob
par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngan par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong
pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid

dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga'
ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing
mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga'

ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun

'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod

do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med

che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod
do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du

shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po

stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /

dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /
bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod
do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs

pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir

gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab
cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan

gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang
byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par

rdzogs bar 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong

pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag

par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /

rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge
'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco

brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs

des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod

nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che
zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i
lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod
do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu
che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og
min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi
lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// //

! de la lam shes mtshon byed kyi chos bzhi pa mthong lam rgyas bshad skabs snar thang par mar tshad med kyi 'gres rkang gcig las sdug bsngal rjes bzod dang rjes shes kyi mdo so sor med pa 'bum gyi gnod 'joms sogs

dang mthun zhing / de'ang tshad med kyi don tshad ma med pa dang / tshad med pa gnyis ka la drang du rung bas yin nam snyam la/ sde dger de chad skyon du bsam ste rjes shes kyi mdor dpag tu med pa'i mdo tshan
zhig bcug 'dug pa 'di ni/ yum gsum gnod 'joms/ dag ldan/ zla 'od/ snying mchog /grags cha/ yum gsum mthun bstan rnams dang 'grig tsam yang / 'phags seng gi 'grel

chen gnyis dang / la brgyad ma dang don gsal sogs rgya gzhung tshad thub rnams dang 'gal bar snang la/ lhag par gong gi gzhung drug po de la gser phreng sogs su rje yab sras kyis dgag brjod yang yang mdzad phyir dag

gtugs kyi khungs su mi che bas da res dpag med dor zhing / tshad med kyi don gnyis su 'gyur bas don la 'gal ba med pa de lta na'ang brgyad stong par tshad ma med pa dang / tshad med pa'i mdo so sor mdzad pa ltar mngon rtogs

rgyan du'ang tshad ma med bcas dang / tshad med pa dang zhes tshad ma med pa logs su gsungs la/ de bzhin du 'phags seng gi gzhung snang ba gnyis sogs rgya 'grel nyer gcig tu grags pa'i nang tshan mdo rgyan sbyar
phal cher dang / bod kyi mkhas pa bu ston/ nya dbon/ rje yab sras sogs tshad ldan gyi gzhung rnams mgrin gcig tu dpag med dor te rjes bzod la tshad ma med pa'i mdo dang / rjes shes la tshad med
pa'i mdo so sor 'dren par mdzad 'dug pa bzhin 'jug pa bde ba'i phyir glegs bam 'dir tshad ma med pa'i 'gres rkang gsar du bcug pa la gzur gnas mkhas pa rnams kyis legs par
dpyad 'tshal// //
